text: GRANTED, NOW THAT I HAVE MY BODY, IT'S STUNTED, WORTHLESS MAGIC AS FAR AS I'M CONCERNED, BUT EVEN SO...!
FOR MAGIC OF THIS WORLD, I MEAN. AND FOR A WEED LIKE THE SORT YOU FIND EVERYWHERE, ONE WHO ISN'T EVEN A FOUR-LEAF CLOVER!
IT'S JUST LIKE THE MAGIC ITEMS WE'RE MAKING NOW. IF EVERYONE WAS ABLE TO USE THEIR POWERS FOR EVERYONE ELSE'S SAKE, DON'T YOU THINK THIS WOULD BE A GOOD COUNTRY?
YOU SAID YOUR SEALING MAGIC ONLY OPENS AND SHUTS THINGS, BUT I BET THERE ARE ALL SORTS OF OTHER WAYS TO USE IT.
EVERYBODY HAS THEIR OWN POTENTIAL, AND THERE ARE THINGS ONLY THEY CAN DO.
...BUT I THINK EVERYBODY'S INCREDIBLE. WE'RE JUST DIFFERENT FROM EACH OTHER, THAT'S ALL.
I'M A FOUR-LEAF WITH LIGHT MAGIC, AND EVERYONE SAYS THAT'S INCREDIBLE
THE ONES YOU LOOKED DOWN ON AND STEPPED ON AND TOYED WITH ARE GOING TO DEFEAT YOU TODAY!!
AS IF YOU CAN TALK! YOU CAN'T EVEN EXIST UNLESS YOU STEAL FROM OTHERS!!
